Download the dictionary to access Talk & Translate functionality - allows quick reference across different languages.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for using Talk & Translate. Here's what's new:
* Brand new AI-based camera translation
* New languages added: Filipino, Bengali, Javanese, Persian, Malay, Indonesian, Khmer, Bulgarian, Spanish (Mexico), Vietnamese

Thank you for using Talk & Translate. Here is what's new:

By popular demand, our brand new Offline Mode is here!

22 new languages: Croatian, Esperanto, Gujarati, Icelandic, Kannada, Latin, Latvian, Macedonian, Malayalam, Marathi, Burmese (Myanmar), Nepali, Serbian, Sinhala, Sundanese, Swahili (Kenya), Swahili (Tanzania), Telugu, Ukrainian, Urdu (India), Urdu (Pakistan), Welsh.

Improved audio quality for 8 languages: Arabic (Saudi Arabia), Czech, Finnish, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Mandarin (China/Simplified), Mandarin (Taiwan/Traditional)

• Support for more languages: We've added 31 new languages. ( Afrikaans, Amharic, Armenian, Albanian, Arabic (UAE), Azerbaijani, Cebuano, Estonian, Galician, Georgian, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hmong, Igbo, Irish, Kazakh, Kinyarwanda, Kurdish, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Malagasy, Maltese, Odia, Pashto, Punjabi, Sindhi, Slovenian, Sesotho, Uyghur, Yiddish, Yoruba).
• You can add definitions from Dictionary to Favorites.
